title: Pokemon Scarlet & Violet: Enough to Bring Us Back? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.03.22
description:
Blessing and Greg talk about that Pokemon Presentation, Blizzard cancelling a World of Warcraft mobile game, and Nintendo financial results!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:18 - Housekeeping

A new episode of the Kinda Funny Xcast is up right now. It’s the start of Xcast being up on a new day! Wednesday! The crew talks about game franchises they’ve never played before. Catch that right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on the podcast services around the globe.

Our Bullet Train review is up on Youtube.com/KindaFunny and on the Screencast podcast feed.

The Roper Report  -

00:08:47 - We got a bunch of new details on Pokemon Scarlet and Violet
00:30:53 - Ad
00:32:38 - Nintendo Switch is seeing a sales decline
00:40:32 - Blizzard and NetEase have canceled a mobile World Of Warcraft game
00:48:18 - EA Says Single Player Games Are a 'Really, Really Important' Part Of Its Portfolio
00:53:41 - Out today
00:57:46 - AEW Fight Forever Leaked Trailer
01:02:19 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Tim
